https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7S71WgitLHw8NA59OJgYagNvV22.jpg Sidhu breaks his father's trust when he defies him and continues his relationship with Priya, the unsophisticated girl he loves. Determined to win Sidhu's father's heart, Priya decides to stay with his family. Bhalobasa Bhalobasa
